HDC.JO.summary: Hudaco Industries Limited imports and distributes automotive, industrial, and electrical consumable products primarily in the southern African region. It operates through two segments, Consumer-Related Products and Engineering Consumables. The Consumer-Related Products segment distributes clutch kits, automotive ignition leads, oil and hydraulic seals, wheels, brake and clutch hydraulics, mountings, bushes, hydraulic repair kits, cylinders, hoses, CV joints, wheel hubs, suspension components, and vehicle components to the automotive and industrial after-market; lead acid, solar batteries, chargers, and battery management equipment; power tools, marine engines, survey instruments, rivets, and fasteners; and intrusion detection, access control, fire detection, and surveillance/CCTV solutions, including IP/GSM network and support services. This segment also distributes professional mobile radio equipment and radio systems integrators; wireless networking, VoIP, and video products; and communication management software, solutions, and equipment. The Engineering Consumables segment manufactures and distributes hydraulic and pneumatic products; dragline hoses; conveyor drive pulleys; idlers; and ferrous and non-ferrous castings, as well as designs, services, and repairs systems. This segment also distributes diesel engines and spares, and support services; chains, seals, geared and electric motors, beltings, drivetrains, filtration solutions, kits and accessories, and industrial hoses; and electrical power transmission products, bearings, thermoplastic pipes and fittings, and steel. The company primarily serves wholesale and retail, automotive, manufacturing, mining, exports, security, alternative energy, construction, agricultural, and public sectors. Hudaco Industries Limited was founded in 1891 and is headquartered in Edenvale, South Africa.

I5J.F.summary: Invicta Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, distributes engineering components and consumables, and provides technical services and solutions in South Africa, Singapore, and rest of Africa. It operates through three segments: Engineering Solutions Group, Capital Equipment Group, and Kian Ann Engineering. The company distributes engineering consumables, including bearings, seals and gaskets, power transmissions, material handling solutions, fasteners, geared and electric drives, and motor and tools; fluid technology products and solutions, such as hydraulic, pneumatic, filtration, and lubrication; and technical design, on-site installation, maintenance, breakdown, condition monitoring, as well as design engineering and failure analysis services, and belting products. It also distributes vibrating equipment; industrial gearbox units; tools and equipment, including personal protective equipment, lifting, and welding products; vibrator motors, and tensioning and suspension systems; and automotive components and solutions. In addition, the company imports, supplies, and distributes agricultural machinery, implements, and related spare parts; construction and mining equipment, such as crawler excavators, wheel loaders, wheel excavators, wheel excavators, mini-excavators, backhoe loaders, skid-steer loaders, crushing and screening equipment, ground-engaging tools, articulated dump trucks, hydraulic hammers, and turf related machinery; after-market replacement spare parts for agricultural machinery; heavy machinery parts and diesel engine components; and forklift trucks and equipment. Further, it holds properties; and involved in the financial and treasury activities. The company is headquartered in Johannesburg, South Africa.
